sense.def:
Stuck
je preteklik in pretekli deležnik glagola
to stick
.

Kadar je nekaj
stuck in a particular position
, je nekje pritrjeno in se ne more premakniti.

seg.quote: The lift seems to be stuck between the second and third floors.

sense.def:
To be stuck when we are trying to do something
pomeni, da nečesa, kar poskušamo narediti, ne moremo nadaljevati, ker je pretežavno.

seg.quote: Ask for help the minute you're stuck.

sense.def:
To be stuck in a place or unpleasant situation
pomeni, da ne moremo oditi iz nekega kraja ali se rešiti iz neprijetnega položaja.

seg.quote: The boss rang to explain that he was stuck in Milan.
